author: Lesley Lyons
title: PeopleStrategy® to Host Charity Golf Event to Benefit the Scarborough and Friends Foundation
text:
PeopleStrategy, Inc.® a leading Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) provider of end-to-end Human Capital Management (HCM) solutions, will host a charity golf tournament on November 2, 2015 at White Columns Country Club to raise money for the Scarborough and Friends Foundation , which provides financial assistance and support to families with members who suffer from terminal, chronic and debilitating illnesses. “Randy Cooper, our CEO, and Sam Scarborough, one of the Foundation’s founders, met about two years ago. Randy was impressed by the Foundation’s mission and direct support of families in need, leading to PeopleStrategy becoming one of the Foundation’s first Corporate Sponsors,” said David Fiacco, president and COO of PeopleStrategy. “We look forward to continuing our support of SAFF by hosting a charity golf tournament and donating a custom-made “Incredible Hulk” motorcycle as the grand prize for a raffle to be held in conjunction with the event.”
All proceeds from the event will go directly to the Scarborough Foundation which has identified Trey Mills and his family as the recipient. Now 4 years old, Trey was born with a rare overgrowth syndrome called Proteus, which can cause differences in the appearance and growth rate of various body parts. In Trey’s case, it has affected the entire left side of his body – inside and out. In his short lifetime, Trey has endured over 400 doctor appointments, 16 sedations, nine surgeries, and had both his left leg and left ring finger amputated. In July, Trey was diagnosed with severe lung disease and is currently waiting to go on the double lung transplant list in Missouri. Follow Trey’s journey at https://www.facebook.com/HopeForTrey?fref=nf .
“PeopleStrategy has been very supportive of the Foundation’s efforts and we are extremely thankful for their generosity and partnership,” said Sam Scarborough, SAFF founder. “We are looking forward to a successful golf tournament and raffle, and to helping Trey and his family as much as we can.”

First Trust Portfolios LP

Performance Trust Capital Partners
Do My Own Pest Control

For more information on participating in, or sponsoring the event, please contact Lesley Lyons at 404.410.4154 or Lesley.Lyons(at)peoplestrategy(dot)com.
About Scarborough & Friends Foundation (SAFF)
Founded in 2005 by Sam and April Scarborough, the Scarborough & Friends Foundation (SAFF) provides financial assistance and support to families with members who suffer from terminal, chronic or debilitating illnesses. SAFF has raised hundreds of thousands of dollars, and 100 percent of all proceed go directly to the recipients and their families to help offset the high costs of medication, equipment and treatment or to make a last wish come true. You can learn more about the organization at facebook.com/ScarboroughFoundation?fref=ts.
